product_name: REI Northway Pants - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The REI Northway Pants in women's plus sizes are made from a 4-way stretch, quick-drying fabric that's comfortable on the plane or on the trail. Pant legs cinch with self ties, offering a range of inseam lengths to adapt to changes in the weather or your style preference. UPF 50+ fabric rating provides excellent protection from UV rays. Snap-front waist has an Internal drawcord to fine-tine the fit. The REI Northway Pants include a secure zip pocket hidden inside one of the hand pockets.
short_description: The REI Northway Pants in women's plus sizes are made from a 4-way stretch, quick-drying fabric that's comfortable on the plane or on the trail.
